软件包 org.crosswire.jsword.book.install
的使用

使用 org.crosswire.jsword.book.install 的软件包
org.crosswire.bibledesktop.book.install An Install Manager for Books: Bibles, Commentaries and Dictionaries. 
org.crosswire.jsword.book.install An abstraction of an installer. 
org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.sword An implementaiion of an installer that can handle Sword Books (Modules). 
org.crosswire.jsword.bridge Command line programs to do useful things. 
org.crosswire.jsword.util This package contains general Project specific utilities. 
 

org.crosswire.bibledesktop.book.install 使用的 org.crosswire.jsword.book.install 中的类
Installer
          An interface that allows us to download from a specific source of Bible data.
InstallManager
          A manager to abstract out the non-view specific book installation tasks.
 

org.crosswire.jsword.book.install 使用的 org.crosswire.jsword.book.install 中的类
Installer
          An interface that allows us to download from a specific source of Bible data.
InstallerEvent
          An InstallerEvent is fired whenever an Installer is added or removed from the system.
InstallerFactory
          An abstract factory to allow generic creation of Installers.
InstallerListener
          InstallerListener are able to be notified about changes to the numbers of Installers known to the system.
InstallException
          Something went wrong with a Book.

Installer
          An interface that allows us to download from a specific source of Bible data.
InstallerFactory
          An abstract factory to allow generic creation of Installers.
InstallException
          Something went wrong with a Book.
